tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClimateModelResults (
    SimulationID INT,
    ModelName VARCHAR(255),
    Temperature FLOAT,
    Humidity FLOAT,
    WindSpeed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SimulationResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    result_data JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES ClimateModels(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ResearchProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE simulation_runs (
  run_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT REFERENCES climate_models(model_id),
  run_date DATE,
  run_time TIME,
  completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  run_id INT REFERENCES simulation_runs(run_id),
  result_date DATE,
  result_time TIME,
  result_data JSON
);
